Posts.Content: Please read "What Your Doctor May Not Tell You About Breast Cancer" by John R. Lee.  You will find results of Tamoxifen studies. He strongly suggests avoiding tamoxifen. Blood tests do not tell the whole story about hormone balance and then , with a health care professional,  find the right use of a progesterone cream. According to Lee, Tamoxifen puts cancer cells in a deep sleep and after 5 years is of no use. Info in book claims that it does not work for breast cancer tumors that were not estrogen driven or when cancer had spread to lymph nodes. Serious side effects: uterine cancer, triples risk of blood clots in lungs, increased risk of stroke, blindness, liver dystfunction.  World Health organization has listed tamoxifen as a cancer causing drug. Lee recognizes that many doctors do not know how to evaluate saliva tests so it may be hard to get advice on a better choice than tamoxifen.
Posts.Title: side effects from Femara
